dply.info_text: It is a program that allows you to deploy docker containers and view the status of containers on the web.

frontera.info_text: It is a library that simplifies repetitive tasks in web development.

yuna.info_text: It is an NLP artificial intelligence API that allows you to understand users' emotions and talk to them.

hana.info_text: It's an API designed to simplify waste classification.

mina.info_text: It is an API created for the purpose of checking swear words.
